summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick/annual) for correctional officers and other personnel. The document is significant as it provides a detailed snapshot of staffing on the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.

persons.name: Adams, J
persons.context: Listed as assigned to CONTROL post #82 on the daily roster.

persons.name: Montoya, H
persons.context: Listed as assigned to INTERNAL post, noted with (NC) for 'No Change'.

persons.name: Masuao, J
persons.context: Listed as assigned to ATTY CONF (Attorney Conference) post.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Assigned to SHU (Special Housing Unit) post #81. Later entries show him being relieved due to 'Sick Leave' and involved in shift swaps.

persons.name: Cohen
persons.context: Listed on the roster, but the specific post assignment is unclear from the fragmented text.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Appears multiple times in change records, listed as being on 'Sick / Annual' leave and being relieved from posts like SHU and INTERNAL.

persons.name: Devi
persons.context: Listed as assigned to SHU post with a shift time of 08:00-18:00.

persons.name: Hodge, J
persons.context: Appears in a change record on page 7, listed with status 'Sick / Annual' for the INTERNAL post.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Roster

locations: MCC NEW YORK NEW YORK NY
Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is the staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Saturday, August 10, 2019.
The roster details posts such as CONTROL, SHU (Special Housing Unit), ATTY CONF (Attorney Conference), INTERNAL, ESCORT, and LOBBY CONTROL, along with assigned officers and their shift times.
Multiple entries show officers (e.g., Thomas, M; Noel, T; Hodge, J) on 'Sick / Annual' leave or having shift changes, indicating dynamic staffing on that day.
The document's date (August 10, 2019) is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found deceased in his cell at this facility.
The roster includes a 'Recapitulation' section tallying 108 Correctional Services Staff and 36 Overtime Occurrences for the day.
